item.title: Book Your Appointment with COMM+D Online!
item.description: Are you working on a writing assignment, oral presentation, or visual design project? Whether you’re at the beginning brainstorming stages or finishing up your final revisions, the Center for Global Communication+Design (Comm+D) can help, so be sure to schedule an appointment with a member of the Center’s trained staff!

item.title: The National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine Webinar August 12, 2025
item.description: Join The National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine on August 12 for a webinar on creating more resilient supply chains using the latest insights from the mathematical sciences. Speakers will discuss their work on optimizing supply chains, including ways to address drug shortages, improve military logistics, and leverage on-demand manufacturing. Register here: https://www.nationalacademies.org/event/45383_08-2025_building-resilient-supply-chains-innovation-by-the-numbers

item.title: HelioCampus Fall Syllabus Available - Complete by September 11, 2025
item.description:
The HelioCampus syllabus module is available for faculty to access for the fall beginning on August 7, 2025. Based on the requirements from the Provost’s office, faculty should have their syllabi published in HelioCampus by September 11, 2025. For a Refresher Handout and information on Training please see the expanded announcement.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
